EnumProperty.Name: DriverType
EnumProperty.Description: Specific type of driver that will be created

EnumValue.Name: WDM
EnumValue.Description: A WDM driver (including all miniport/port drivers like NDIS, StorPort, etc)

EnumValue.Name: ExportDriver
EnumValue.Description: A WDM driver which exports functions which other drivers can call
